headline: Can Amgen (AMGN) Keep the Earnings Surprise Streak Alive?

headline: Therapeutics Stocks Q1 Teardown: Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) Vs The Rest
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) and the rest of the therapeutics stocks fared in Q1.
